ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Raven Hex always hated children stories, now she finds herself trapped in their world. Surrounded by the characters that annoyed her the most, Raven Hex decides to take matters into her own hands and rewrite their tales, thus changing the endings to their stories a possible her own.
